transcription.text: "I love listening to music while I'm working, and the music gives me ideas for the pictures. I might be listening to Tina Turner and that reminds me of when Tina was in the movie Mad Max 3 in the sparkly silver dress. Mad Max is filmed in the Outback and looks just like Indulkana, so I start thinking about what it might be like if Tina came to my community." â€“ Kaylene Whiskey

work.title: Tina Turner in Coober Pedy
work.headline_credit: Anangu Pitjantjatjara Yankunytjatjara (APY) Lands, South Australia, Australia, 2018
